data.title: Kris Jenner addresses rumours she secretly married long-time boyfriend Corey Gamble
data.meta_description: Kris Jenner is set to address growing speculation she secretly married her long-time boyfriend, Corey Gambl...
data.text:
Kris Jenner is set to address growing speculation she secretly married her long-time boyfriend, Corey Gamble.

The family matriarch, 66, and 'momager' sets the record straight when asked about the rumours by her daughter, Khloé Kardashian, on this week's episode of their new-look reality TV show, The Kardashians.

"I've heard from so many people that you're secretly married," Khloé, 37, says in a teaser clip for Thursday's episode.

READ MORE: Lip reader captures stern moment between Kate and Prince Louis

The 66-year-old took the question in her stride and, unflustered, said: "No, I'm not secretly married."

When Khloé points at the yellow ring on her wedding finger, Kris laughs: "Stop. You think I'm gonna get married and not have a big-ass party? I'm not secretly married. I swear to God on all my kids and Daddy." Watch the clip above.

Kris was referring to her first husband, the late Robert Kardashian, who is the father of her four eldest children: Kourtney, Kim, Khloé and Rob. The reality star also shares daughters Kendall and Kylie Jenner with ex Caitlyn Jenner.

READ MORE: Johnny Depp's surprise move following trial

As for Gamble, Kris began dating him shortly after they met at a party in 2014 when she was fresh from her split from Caitlyn. However, they didn't go public with their romance until 2015.

Although the pair have yet to marry, Kris did reveal Corey, 41, has moved into her new Calabasas home in California.

READ MORE: Mum shocked by 'little white grains' on daughter's toenail

"He's been so amazing moving into the house because he really handles everything," she says on the show. "There's so much security. I love that side of him because he's always really protective."

As for her children, they have always approved and welcomed Corey into the family, despite having reservations about the couple's 25-year age gap.

"I'm worried about Mum a little bit," Kim said on their reality show when the pair first started dating. "She doesn't listen to me when I'm like, 'You know, you should really take it slow.' … I just hope that my mum really thinks things through because I don't want her to rush into anything."
